oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Nell F. Beswick correspondence with Lawrence G. Derthick, 1955 December 3
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Beswich, Nelle F.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter to superintendent of public schools in Chattanooga, Tennessee, Lawrence G. Derthick, expressing support of the school system's administration's decision to integrate the public schools.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education
